text: Craiova (), the fifth largest Romanian city,National Institute of Statistics, January 1, 2006. After Bucharest, Constanţa, Iaşi and Timişoara. is the capital of Dolj County. It is on the east side of the Jiu River. This is in the central part of Oltenia. ==Sister cities== * Kuopio, Finland * Nanterre, France * Shiyan, People's Republic of China * Skopje, North Macedonia * Vratza, Bulgaria * Lyon, France * Uppsala, Sweden ==References== Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Dolj County
title: Craiova
